function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased contact rates in downtown residents led to 50% more efficient spread of pathogens","Impact":"Higher risk of contagion for downtown residents","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce contact rates in downtown areas","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, contact tracing apps, public health campaigns","People":"Downtown residents","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Wave-like patterns of disease spread emanating from city center","Impact":"Unequal spread of disease with higher incidence in certain areas","Mitigation":"Implement targeted vaccination campaigns, improve healthcare access in affected areas","Technologies":"GIS mapping, targeted messaging platforms, mobile vaccination clinics","People":"Residents in areas with higher disease incidence","Owner":"Healthcare providers, local government"},{"Description":"Statistical dependence of disease spread on distance from city's largest retail hub","Impact":"Unequal distribution of disease incidence based on proximity to retail hub","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce overcrowding in retail areas, promote online shopping options","Technologies":"Retail occupancy monitoring systems, online retail platforms, crowd management strategies","People":"Residents in proximity to retail hub","Owner":"Retail businesses, local government"}]}
